top_stories.title: Investors predict AI is coming for labor in 2026
top_stories.description: The exact impact AI will have on the enterprise labor market is unclear but investors predict trends will start to emerge in 2026.
top_stories.author: Rebecca Szkutak
top_stories.content: The exact impact AI will have on the enterprise labor market is unclear but investors predict trends will start to emerge in 2026.

top_stories.title: AI agent-driven browser automation for enterprise workflow management
top_stories.description: Enterprise organizations increasingly rely on web-based applications for critical business processes, yet many workflows remain manually intensive, creating operational inefficiencies and compliance risks. Despite significant technology investments, knowledge workers routinely navigate between eight to twelve different web applications during standard workflows, constantly switching contexts and manually transferring information between systems. Data entry and validation tasks […]
top_stories.author: Kosti Vasilakakis
top_stories.content: Enterprise organizations increasingly rely on web-based applications for critical business processes, yet many workflows remain manually intensive, creating operational inefficiencies and compliance risks. top_stories.title: CES 2026: How to watch Sony Honda Afeela’s presentation
top_stories.description: Sony Honda Mobility will stream its CES 2026 press conference live from Las Vegas on Monday, January 5, 2026, at 8 p.m. ET via the Afeela official YouTube channel. The event centers on electric vehicles from the Sony-Honda joint venture, highlighting the Afeela 1 model. The press conference occupies the traditional end-of-press-day slot at CES. […]
top_stories.author: Aytun Çelebi

top_stories.title: A Coding Implementation of an OpenAI-Assisted Privacy-Preserving Federated Fraud Detection System from Scratch Using Lightweight PyTorch Simulations
top_stories.description: In this tutorial, we demonstrate how we simulate a privacy-preserving fraud detection system using Federated Learning without relying on heavyweight frameworks or complex infrastructure. We build a clean, CPU-friendly setup that mimics ten independent banks, each training a local fraud-detection model on its own highly imbalanced transaction data. We coordinate these local updates through a […] The post A Coding Implementation of an OpenAI-Assisted Privacy-Preserving Federated Fraud Detection...
top_stories.author: Asif Razzaq
